content.full_text:
Resolution of the Illinois General Assembly regarding Revenue from the Sale of Public
               Lands, 10 January 18351
paragraphs:
Resolution of the Illinois General Assembly regarding Revenue from the Sale of Public
               Lands, 10 January 18351

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincolnintroduced the resolution in theHouse of Representativeson January 10, 1835.Jesse B. Thomas Jr. moved that the House refer the resolution to the Committee of the Whole and make
                  it the order of the day for January 13.  The House rejected this motion and tabled
                  the resolution.Illinois HouseJournal. 1835. 9th G. A., 1st sess., 269.
